accepted_if: Uyu murima ugomba kwemerwa mugihe :other ari :value.
active_url: Uyu murima ntabwo ari URL yemewe.
after: Uyu murima ugomba kuba itariki nyuma ya :date.
after_or_equal: Uyu murima ugomba kuba itariki nyuma cyangwa ingana na :date.
alpha: Uyu murima ugomba kuba urimo inyuguti gusa.

alpha_num: Uyu murima ugomba kuba urimo inyuguti nimibare gusa.
before: Uyu murima ugomba kuba itariki mbere ya :date.

between.string: Uyu murima ugomba kuba uri hagati yinyuguti :min na :max.
boolean: Uyu murima ugomba kuba ukuri cyangwa ibinyoma.
date: Uyu murima ntabwo ari itariki yemewe.
date_equals: Uyu murima ugomba kuba itariki ingana na :date.
declined_if: Uyu murima ugomba kwangwa mugihe :other ari :value.
different: Uyu murima na :other bigomba kuba bitandukanye.
digits_between: Uyu murima ugomba kuba uri hagati yimibare :min na :max.
dimensions: Uyu murima ufite ibipimo byamashusho bitemewe.
email: Uyu murima ugomba kuba aderesi imeri yemewe.
